features.featureTitle: Update the frontend ChatInterface and MessageBubble components to detect game-payload responses and render an interactive game directly inside the chat window. The game should appear in an embedded sandbox (e.g., an iframe with srcdoc or a canvas-based renderer) within the AI message bubble. Include a visible 'Play Game' label or title above the game area, and allow the user to interact with the game without leaving the chat.

Add gaming-themed prompt suggestions in the empty-state UI (ChatInterface.tsx) that hint at the game-building capability, such as 'Build me a Snake game', 'Create a Pong game', and 'Make a memory card game', so users discover this feature naturally.
